destinations.name: Nainital
destinations.description: The beautiful lake district of Uttarakhand, known for its stunning Naini Lake and panoramic views of the Himalayas.
destinations.detailedDescription: Nainital is a picturesque hill station built around a beautiful volcanic lake. It offers boating, trekking, and spectacular views of the snow-capped Himalayas.

transport.road: Well connected by road from Delhi

destinations.name: Mussoorie
destinations.description: The Queen of Hills, offering breathtaking views of the Shivalik ranges and the Doon Valley.
destinations.detailedDescription: Mussoorie is one of the most popular hill stations in India, known for its scenic beauty, colonial architecture, and pleasant climate throughout the year.
destinations.bestTime: April to June, September to November

transport.road: Well connected from Delhi and other major cities

categories.name: Popular Destinations
categories.description: Most visited hill stations in Uttarakhand

categories.name: Adventure Sports
categories.description: Destinations for trekking and adventure activities

categories.name: Spiritual Retreats
categories.description: Places with religious and spiritual significance
